targets.expr: (sum(windows_logical_disk_size_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", node_name="$server"}) by (instance) - sum(windows_logical_disk_free_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", node_name="$server"}) by (instance)) / sum(windows_logical_disk_size_bytes{volume!~"Harddisk.*", node_name="$server"}) by (instance) * 100
